Class vrml.external.MSVRML2CControl 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----vrml.external.MSVRML2CControl
public final class MSVRML2CControl
extends Object
VRML External Interface Helper class

Static class for associating control handles with applets so that Browser.getBrowser(Applet) works this class is for compatibility with existing IE-EAI MSMSVRML2CControl applications and forwards all calls to blaxxunCC3DControl

MSVRML2CControl()

FreeControls()

GetControl(Applet, String, int)
